net.proteusframework.ui.workspace

Interface UITaskManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    WorkspaceAware
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ListTaskManager

    public interface UITaskManager
extends WorkspaceAware
    Manager for user interface tasks. This is typically implemented as a task bar.

    The task manager is responsible for managing and organizing the UITasks as well as display a representation of the current tasks. Only the Workspace interacts with a UITaskManager.

    Some of the methods in this are similar to some of the methods in the Workspace class. Keep in mind, that the contracts will typically differ due to the differing responsibilities of the classes.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • addUITask

        void addUITask(UITask uiTask)
        Add a UI task to the TaskManager. If a task with the same identifier already exists, it is ignored. This is called by the Workspace. Calling this method does not "select" a task. That is done by calling selectUITask(UITask).
        Parameters:
        uiTask - the UI Task.

      • addUITask

        void addUITask(UITask parent,
             UITask uiTask)
        Add a UI task to the TaskManager. If a task with the same identifier already exists, it is ignored; otherwise the task is added as a sub-task of the specified parent task.

        This is called by the Workspace. Calling this method does not "select" a task. That is done by calling selectUITask(UITask).

        Parameters:
        parent - the parent task.
        uiTask - the UI Task.

      • canAddUITask

        UITaskManager.AddUITaskState canAddUITask(UITask task)
        Test if the UITask can be added to the task manager.
        Parameters:
        task - the task.
        Returns:
        the state.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clear the task list.

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        The task manager is being destroyed. This is called to allow the task manager to release resources held.

      • getComponent

        Component getComponent()
        Get the UI component for this task manager.
        Returns:
        the UI component.

      • getParentUITask

        UITask getParentUITask(UITask uiTask)
        Get the parent UITask.
        Parameters:
        uiTask - the UI Task.
        Returns:
        the parent or null.

      • getPreviousUITask

        UITask getPreviousUITask()
        Get the previous UI task.
        Returns:
        the previously selected UITask or null if not available or not implemented.

      • getSelectedUITask

        UITask getSelectedUITask()
        Get the currently selected UI task.
        Returns:
        the currently selected UI task. null if there are no UI tasks or no selected UI task.

      • getUITask

        UITask getUITask(String identifier)
        Get UITask by identifier.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the identifier.
        Returns:
        the UITask or null.

      • getUITaskList

        List<UITask> getUITaskList()
        Get the list of tasks in the order maintained by the task manager.
        Returns:
        the list of tasks.

      • removeUITask

        void removeUITask(UITask uiTask)
        Remove UI task. If this is the currently selected task the currently selected task becomes null. It is up to the workspace to select another task. This is called by the Workspace.
        Parameters:
        uiTask - the task.

      • selectUITask

        void selectUITask(UITask uiTask)
        Marks the specified UI Task as selected. This is called by the Workspace.

        Implementations may optionally fire a UITaskSelectionEvent to notify WorkspaceHandler of successful selection of a task.

        Parameters:
        uiTask - the task.
